name: Europass
description: Professional CV template with a left sidebar for photo and contact information

sections.name: Skills
sections.description: Technical and professional skills listed as bullet points

sections.name: Experience
sections.description: Work experience with company, position, dates, and achievements

sections.name: Education
sections.description: Educational background with institutions, degrees, and dates

specialFeatures.name: Profile Photo
specialFeatures.description: Displays in left sidebar. Format with: ![profile|align=center|width=150px](/data/images/your-image.jpg)

specialFeatures.name: Contact Information
specialFeatures.description: Displayed in the sidebar. Format as a single line with pipe separators: **Job Title** | email | phone | links
